p: Trunk bark: The essential oil isolated from Z. psammophilum trunk bark was mainly composed of methylketones, such as undecan-2-one (61.0%) and tridecan-2-one (37.1%). Other compounds, such as undecan-2-ol and tridecan-2-ol, were also found in this oil but in much lower quantities (1.5% and 0.4%, respectively) ( Table 1).
